TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityTypeCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: 将 序列化为新类型。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityTypeCodeDomSerializer> 执行与 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer> 相同的任务，但如果使用此类序列化 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>，则它将定义新类型。
